title: Complete Liver Cleanse | Nature's Way®
description: Supports liver health & the body's detoxification processes.*
cleaned_text: Complete Liver Cleanse [](/products/complete-liver-cleanse) Complete Liver Cleanse Dairy Free [View full details](/products/complete-liver-cleanse) Product information Complete Liver Cleanse Supports Liver Health & Detoxification* Your liver plays a very important role in your general well-being. It's a key organ in filtering toxins from the body. Nature's Way Complete Liver Cleanse helps support the liver and the body's detoxification processes with a blend of milk thistle extract and botanicals, including dandelion root, turmeric, and artichoke leaf extract.* It includes an amino acid blend to support phase II detoxification and nutritional cofactors for detoxification processes in a 14-day cleanse.* Supports Liver Health & Detoxification* Your liver plays a very important role in your general well-being. It's a key organ in filtering toxins from the body. Nature's Way Complete Liver Cleanse helps support the liver and the body's detoxification processes with a blend of milk thistle extract and botanicals, including dandelion root, turmeric, and artichoke leaf extract.* It includes an amino acid blend to support phase II detoxification and nutritional cofactors for detoxification processes in a 14-day cleanse.* We Go Where Herbs Grow Best At Nature's Way, we believe that nature knows best, and that the gifts of nature can enrich your wellness journey. We travel across the globe to source herbs from the continents and climates where they grow best. It's how we deliver the uncompromising quality we're known for to help you live your healthiest life. Help us protect this place we call home and recycle your bottle. 1g Total Carbohydrate 50mg Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) 8.7mg Thiamin Artichoke Leaf Extract standardized to 13% caffeoylquinic acids calculated as chlorogenic acids (3.9 mg) ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients Complete Liver Cleanse Does Not Contain Yeast - Derived Ingredient Dairy Artificial Flavors Preservatives Wheat Other Details Setria® is a registered trademark of KYOWA HAKKO BIO Co., Ltd. UPC: 763948013159 SKU: 01315 Complete Liver Cleanse Directions and/or DosageAdults take 3 capsules in the morning and 3 capsules at bedtime for 14 days. WarningDo not use if you have a bile duct obstruction, or if you are allergic to plants of the Asteraceae (Compositae) family, including ragweed. If you are pregnant, nursing, have gallstones, have active liver disease, or if you are taking any medications, consult a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight. Complete Liver Cleanse is a targeted two-week cleanse, designed to remove toxins and support liver health.* The formula contains a unique combination of ingredients which stimulate bile flow, helping to rid the liver of toxins.* Bile is a fluid made in the liver and stored in the gallbladder. Bile helps break down fats in the small intestines. Bile also is responsible for moving toxins to the intestines so they can be expelled from the body. Yes, Complete Liver Cleanse can still be used by a person who has had their gallbladder removed.
